pages.text: Owls are usually active during the night, and usually spawn in forests and taigas. They drop Feathers, like any bird.
As a possible familiar, Owls will increase their friend's capability of flight, namely making Brooms cost no ME.$(br2)They also won't take any fall damage, in case they somehow fall.
Owls can be tamed with Raw Rabbit, and bred with Raw Chicken.
